critique: The document expresses concern and determination to address the disproportionate impact of COVID-19 on underserved communities. It acknowledges the existing inequities and aims to rectify them through a government-wide effort. There is an element of sadness due to the recognition of the suffering and loss experienced by these communities. There is no explicit expression of joy, anger, fear, disgust, or surprise, but the urgency and resolve suggest a strong commitment to action.
